verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and Timothy <S%G5095><s%> [our] brother, <S%G80><s%> to the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is at Corinth <S%G2882><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> who are throughout <S%G3650><s%> Achaia: <S%G882><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> [be] the God <S%G2316><s%> and Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of mercies <S%G3628><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> comfort; <S%G3874><s%>

who comforts <S%G3870><s%> us in all <S%G3956><s%> our affliction <S%G2347><s%> so <S%G1519><s%> that we may be able <S%G1410><s%> to comfort <S%G3870><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who are in any <S%G3956><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> with the comfort <S%G3874><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> we ourselves <S%G846><s%> are comforted <S%G3870><s%> by God. <S%G2316><s%>

For just <S%G2531><s%> as the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> are ours <S%G1473><s%> in abundance, <S%G4052><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> our comfort <S%G3874><s%> is abundant <S%G4052><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But if <S%G1535><s%> we are afflicted, <S%G2346><s%> it is for your comfort <S%G3874><s%> and salvation; <S%G4991><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> if <S%G1535><s%> we are comforted, <S%G3870><s%> it is for your comfort, <S%G3874><s%> which is effective <S%G1754><s%> in the patient <S%G5281><s%> enduring <S%G5281><s%> of the same <S%G846><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we also <S%G2532><s%> suffer; <S%G3958><s%>

and our hope <S%G1680><s%> for you is firmly <S%G949><s%> grounded, <S%G949><s%> knowing <S%G3609><s%> that as you are sharers <S%G2844><s%> of our sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> you are [sharers] of our comfort. <S%G3874><s%>

For we do not want <S%G2309><s%> you to be unaware, <S%G50><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> of our affliction <S%G2347><s%> which came <S%G1096><s%> [to us] in Asia, <S%G773><s%> that we were burdened <S%G916><s%> excessively, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236><s%> beyond <S%G5228><s%> our strength, <S%G1411><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that we despaired <S%G1820><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of life; <S%G2198><s%>

indeed, <S%G235><s%> we had <S%G2192><s%> the sentence <S%G610><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that we should not trust <S%G3982><s%> in ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> but in God <S%G2316><s%> who raises <S%G1453><s%> the dead; <S%G3498><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> us from so <S%G5082><s%> great <S%G5082><s%> a [peril of] death, <S%G2288><s%> and will deliver <S%G4506><s%> [us,] He on whom <S%G3739><s%> we have set <S%G1679><s%> our hope. <S%G1679><s%> And He will yet <S%G2089><s%> deliver <S%G4506><s%> us,

you also <S%G2532><s%> joining <S%G4943><s%> in helping <S%G4943><s%> us through your prayers, <S%G1162><s%> that thanks <S%G2168><s%> may be given <S%G2168><s%> by many <S%G4183><s%> persons <S%G4383><s%> on our behalf <S%G5228><s%> for the favor <S%G5486><s%> bestowed <S%G1519><s%> upon us through <S%G1223><s%> [the prayers of] many. <S%G4183><s%>

For our proud <S%G2746><s%> confidence <S%G2746><s%> is this, <S%G3778><s%> the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of our conscience, <S%G4893><s%> that in holiness <S%G41><s%> and godly <S%G2316><s%> sincerity, <S%G1505><s%> not in fleshly <S%G4559><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> but in the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> we have conducted <S%G390><s%> ourselves in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and especially <S%G4053><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> you.

For we write <S%G1125><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> else <S%G243><s%> to you than <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you read <S%G314><s%> and understand, <S%G1921><s%> and I hope <S%G1679><s%> you will understand <S%G1921><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the end; <S%G5056><s%>

just <S%G2531><s%> as you also <S%G2532><s%> partially <S%G3313><s%> did understand <S%G1921><s%> us, that we are your reason <S%G2745><s%> to be proud <S%G2745><s%> as you also <S%G2532><s%> are ours, <S%G1473><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And in this <S%G3778><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> I intended <S%G1014><s%> at first <S%G4387><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you, that you might twice <S%G1208><s%> receive <S%G2192><s%> a blessing; <S%G5485><s%>

that is, to pass <S%G1330><s%> your way <S%G1223><s%> into Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> and again <S%G3825><s%> from Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you, and by you to be helped <S%G4311><s%> on my journey <S%G4311><s%> to Judea. <S%G2453><s%>

Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> I was not vacillating <S%G5530><s%> <S%G1644><s%> when I intended <S%G1014><s%> to do this, <S%G3778><s%> was I? Or <S%G2228><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> I purpose, <S%G1011><s%> do I purpose <S%G1011><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> that with me there should be yes, <S%G3483><s%> yes <S%G3483><s%> and no, <S%G3756><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> [at the same time]?
But as God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful, <S%G4103><s%> our word <S%G3056><s%> to you is not yes <S%G3483><s%> and no. <S%G3756><s%>

For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who was preached <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you by us – by me and Silvanus <S%G4610><s%> and Timothy <S%G5095><s%> – was not yes <S%G3483><s%> and no, <S%G3756><s%> but is yes <S%G3483><s%> in Him.

For as many <S%G3745><s%> as may be the promises <S%G1860><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> in Him they are yes; <S%G3483><s%> wherefore <S%G1352><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> by Him is our Amen <S%G281><s%> to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> us.
Now <S%G1161><s%> He who establishes <S%G950><s%> us with you in Christ <S%G5547><s%> and anointed <S%G5548><s%> us is God, <S%G2316><s%>
who also <S%G2532><s%> sealed <S%G4972><s%> us and gave <S%G1325><s%> [us] the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in our hearts <S%G2588><s%> as a pledge. <S%G728><s%>

But I call <S%G1941><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> as witness <S%G3144><s%> to my soul, <S%G5590><s%> that to spare <S%G5339><s%> you I came <S%G2064><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> to Corinth. <S%G2882><s%>

Not that we lord <S%G2961><s%> it over <S%G2961><s%> your faith, <S%G4102><s%> but are workers <S%G4904><s%> with you for your joy; <S%G5479><s%> for in your faith <S%G4102><s%> you are standing <S%G2476><s%> firm. <S%G2476><s%>
